name: AVAudioSession.RouteSharingPolicy
desc: Cases that indicate the possible route-sharing policies for an audio session.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: A policy that follows standard rules for routing audio output.

items.name: case longFormAudio
items.desc: A policy that routes output to the shared long-form audio output.

items.name: case longFormVideo
items.desc: A policy that routes output to the shared long-form video output.

items.name: case independent
items.desc: A policy in which the route picker UI directs videos to a wireless route.
